question: The National Green Tribunal (NGT) directed the Environment Ministry to constitute expert committee for which project?
explanation:
The National Green Tribunal (NGT) has recently held that environmental clearance was granted to the Kaleshwaram lift irrigation project in Telangana "ex post facto" in violation of the legal requirement.
NGT directed the Ministry of Environment to constitute a seven-member expert committee and suggest relief and rehabilitation measures. It will also assess the extent of damage caused by the project.
